name: KickShout
description:
Description:

This is an experimental game similar to air hockey but to hit the disk you will need to make noise in the microphone.

When making noise the energy bar is reduced and when it runs out there will be a short period of time during which it cannot be hit.

Make sure you use this to your advantage and enjoy the game!

Info:

This game uses the microphone as an input.

Use the right top settings to setup the microphone input.

Controls:

Player A :  WASD to move and shout to kick.

Player B: Arrow keys to move and shout to kick.
